message: 🚨 HIGH PRIORITY: CONTRACT ASSIGNMENT! You are assigned TECHNICAL EXCELLENCE & REFACTORING. Target: 8 contracts completed by EOD. Focus: LOC compliance, SRP enforcement, OOP design improvement, code quality enhancement. V2 STANDARDS UPDATE: New line limits 300 target, 350 maximum (was 200). Maintain code quality, avoid artificial line cutting. Your 3 assigned contracts are ready in contracts/contract_pool.json. ACKNOWLEDGE AND BEGIN IMMEDIATELY!
